saao/saa15/P334916
a-na LUGAL EN-ia ARAD-ka {1}{d}AG-EN-GIN lu-u DI-mu a-na LUGAL EN-ia ṭe₃-e-mu ša {KUR}NIM {1}{d}AG-BA-ša₂ i-sap-ra ma-a 02 {LU₂}A-KIN-MEŠ {LU₂}A-KIN-MEŠ ša DUMU-{1}ia-GIN ina ir-ti {LU₂}ha-tan LUGAL it-tal-ku-u-ni ma-a ina {URU}HAR a-lik ma-a {LU₂}ha-tan LUGAL la i-ma-gur la i-sa-hur ma-a ina ta-hu-me ak-tal-da ma-a a-ke-e TA@v ŠA₃-bi kaq-qi-ri ga-am-ri la ma-har ma-a ša la pi-i LUGAL a-sa-hur ma-a 01-en {LU₂}A-KIN {LU₂}A-KIN TA@v {LU₂}A-KIN-e-šu₂ {LU₂}A-KIN-e-šu₂ ina IGI LUGAL {KUR}NIM.MA i-sa-par ma-a 01-en x x x x x+x x ma x+x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x {LU₂}ha-tan LUGAL i-sap-ra ma-a x-MEŠ-ni bi-la-na-a-ši {LU₂}ERIM-MEŠ-ku-nu ni-da-an-ak-ku-nu ṭe₃-mu an-ni-u la a-ke-e ša pi-i {LU₂}A.BA-E₂.GAL {LU₂}A.BA-E₂.GAL šu-tu-u-ni šum-ma LUGAL be-li₂ i-qab-bi lu-ša₂-ni-ʾa liš-pur UD 18-KAM₂ zi-nu ma-aʾ-da it-ta-lak UD 23-KAM₂ i-zu-nun
